duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise, train, and develop workgroups to ensure safety, production, and attendance standards are met.
Facilitate training for new and current employees and ensure adherence to safety policies and procedures at all times.
Manage department resources to ensure maximum output, accuracy, and efficiency.
Establish and promote a positive, team-oriented work environment emphasizing employee involvement and continual improvement.
Implement employee personal development plans and ensure all employees receive orientation, skills and safety training, evaluations, and coaching.
Ensure compliance with safety policies and procedures at all times.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Logistics, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
